posts.post_content:
Low grade 1910 (blue reverse) or 1911 (red) examples wanted.

Looking for small groups if possible but will consider singles as well. I want to see how feasible it is to make a run for T212-2 and 3 sets. Poor cards encouraged, full size preferred. I love creases and round corners.

I need quite a few, too many to list. Help me:D:D
